item.title: Purge the public dir on Hugo
item.description: Hey, this is just a little PSA for anyone who uses Hugo on their sites: make sure the purge public/ every so often! One weird thing about Hugo is that it generates everything for you but, for some reason, it never checks whether or not something still exists.
